input.activity_signal: Strong evidence of current activity: Active company website (eontelecom.us) describes current operations as "National IPES provider in USA" with facilities in 30+ states; FCC Form 499 database shows 2024 filing with current business description; Second website (eontelecom.com) promotes fiber internet and streaming services; Multiple web search results show active online presence
input.product_summary: EON Telecom is a national IPES provider offering wholesale, enterprise, and retail telecommunications services including VoIP, fiber internet, streaming services, and toll-free number management with real-time provisioning capabilities.
